overview: For more than forty years, Ralph Gibson has served as one of the few truly independent forces within photography. In this film biography, Gibson is very much the star of his own life as he discusses his colorful childhood in Los Angeles as an extra in Hollywood movies, his stints in the U.S. Navy, his time as an assistant to Dorothea Lange, as well as his lean, wayward years in New York.
title: Ralph Gibson: Photographer/Book Artist
